title: Chimichurri roast chicken
ingredients: ['30g finely chopped fresh parsley', '2 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano leaves', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon chilli flakes', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper', '1 (1.5kg) whole chicken', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 large onion, sliced']
